[ACTION] west [STATE] No good path leads that way, and thou art not of the Pioneer class! [ACTION] south [STATE] No good path leads that way, and thou art not of the Pioneer class! [ACTION] south [STATE] OPEN PLAIN A gentle breeze ripples the sparse grasses here, under a blood-red sun. There are many paths. You see mountains to the distant east. You feel a manly twitching in your thews, enlivened by the freedom of the open country. [ACTION] west [STATE] OPEN PLAIN A gentle breeze ripples the sparse grasses here, under a blood-red sun. There are many paths. You see mountains to the distant east. You feel a manly twitching in your thews, enlivened by the freedom of the open country. [ACTION] west [STATE] FARMER'S GREEN A humble WELL provides a centerpiece for this quiet place, surrounded by farmland providing food for the port town to the west. To the north, the shadow of the SLAVER KING'S CASTLE blots out part of the evening sky, but there's no path there from here. [ACTION] west [STATE] FARMER'S GREEN A humble WELL provides a centerpiece for this quiet place, surrounded by farmland providing food for the port town to the west. To the north, the shadow of the SLAVER KING'S CASTLE blots out part of the evening sky, but there's no path there from here. [ACTION] west [STATE] BUSTLING PORT You tread carefully, here. This is the city of the SLAVER KING, and he may have spies anywhere! Fortunately, the crowd here at the docks is a varied, noisy mass of people and creatures from all corners of Vanth. The MARKETPLACE further north surrounds the CASTLE entrance. The DARK ALLEYWAY immediately south might offer shelter if the guards come running. A GROUP OF PIRATES stands around the gangplank of a mighty PIRATE SHIP, deciding who may or may not go IN. [ACTION] south [STATE] BUSTLING PORT You tread carefully, here. This is the city of the SLAVER KING, and he may have spies anywhere! Fortunately, the crowd here at the docks is a varied, noisy mass of people and creatures from all corners of Vanth. The MARKETPLACE further north surrounds the CASTLE entrance. The DARK ALLEYWAY immediately south might offer shelter if the guards come running. A GROUP OF PIRATES stands around the gangplank of a mighty PIRATE SHIP, deciding who may or may not go IN. [ACTION] south [STATE] DARK ALLEYWAY Places like this wretched ALLEYWAY make you yearn for the clean air and freedom of the open country. Buildings lean against one another, far above your head, and RATS scurry around the base of a large BARREL. To the north lay the bustling quayside. To the south, you could easily scramble over the city wall and up a brambly hill. Light shines from a half-open doorway nearby, you could go IN if you wanted. The air from the doorway smells of subtle perfumes and spices. [ACTION] in [STATE] DARK ALLEYWAY Places like this wretched ALLEYWAY make you yearn for the clean air and freedom of the open country. Buildings lean against one another, far above your head, and RATS scurry around the base of a large BARREL. To the north lay the bustling quayside. To the south, you could easily scramble over the city wall and up a brambly hill. Light shines from a half-open doorway nearby, you could go IN if you wanted. The air from the doorway smells of subtle perfumes and spices. [ACTION] in [STATE] PERFUMED BOUDOIR You find yourself in a soft maze of colored veils, leading to a large bed piled with furs and cloth pillows. There are no candles or oil-lamps here, but rather globes of red glass lit by magic, pulsing with the rhythm of soft music. The DELICATE DOXY reclines on the bed, REGARDING you quietly, grinning playfully, and chewing on a bit of her auburn hair. "Hello again, barbarian," she says. The DELICATE DOXY reclines on the bed, REGARDING you quietly, grinning playfully, and chewing on a bit of her auburn hair. "Hello again, barbarian," she says. The HELP command may offer some remedy. [ACTION] use corn on vessa [STATE] VESSA smiles, and gently caresses the EAR OF CORN. [ACTION] south [STATE] GRAVEYARD This dismal GRAVEYARD sits on a hill cloaked in mist, overlooking the SLAVER KING'S seedy SEAPORT to the north. There are hundreds of gravestones, some cracked with centuries of age, some quite new. There is a single large TOMB that a brave soul might choose to ENTER. The breeze dies entirely; now the air is completely still. [ACTION] east [STATE] GRAVEYARD This dismal GRAVEYARD sits on a hill cloaked in mist, overlooking the SLAVER KING'S seedy SEAPORT to the north. There are hundreds of gravestones, some cracked with centuries of age, some quite new. There is a single large TOMB that a brave soul might choose to ENTER. The breeze dies entirely; now the air is completely still. [ACTION] east [STATE] ROCKY RUIN Cracked remnants of walls and a stretch of weed-grown cobblestones tell of an old temple or abbey ... perhaps even a village. Whatever it was, it now lies in ROCKY RUIN. Poking through the remnants, you notice a shadowy archway leading IN to one small structure that remains intact. Simply walking IN, however, isn't currently an option, as a vast RUIN SLUG - the largest you've ever seen - is basking its slimy bulk in the evening sun, right near the entrance. The SLUG makes no move toward you, but you'd have to ASSAIL it (and survive) to find out what lay beyond the arch. You can also see a TELEPHONE POLE here. [ACTION] use eye on slug [STATE] ROCKY RUIN Cracked remnants of walls and a stretch of weed-grown cobblestones tell of an old temple or abbey ... perhaps even a village. The SLUG makes no move toward you, but you'd have to ASSAIL it (and survive) to find out what lay beyond the arch. You can also see a TELEPHONE POLE here. [ACTION] east [STATE] DIZZYING CLIFFSIDE This is the edge of a great cliff, looking over a vast CHASM to the south. The mists are so heavy within that you can barely detect a raging river far, far below. A tiny TREE clings tenaciously to the edge of the cliff. [ACTION] east [STATE] PRISMATIC SPRAY A high WATERFALL cascades down from a mountain ridge above, foaming and roaring into a broad POOL of clean water. The result is a brilliant PRISMATIC SPRAY. The setting is very peaceful. Swimming in the crystalline POOL is a MAGIC FISH, chasing glittering insects that hover near the water's surface. [ACTION] use bait on fish [STATE] PRISMATIC SPRAY A high WATERFALL cascades down from a mountain ridge above, foaming and roaring into a broad POOL of clean water. [ACTION] use bait on fish [STATE] You lower the STINKY BAIT to tempt the MAGIC FISH, but the FISH darts away rapidly. It seems that MAGIC FISH have better taste in BAIT than your average MIRE IMP. [ACTION] use corn on fish [STATE] The MAGIC FISH just swims deeper into the POOL, ignoring you. > REGARD EYE The PYREXIAN EYE, ripped from the skull of the strongest of the SLAVER KING'S beloved pets, is very warm to the touch, and but the slightest squeeze makes it flash briefly with flame. 'Tis nothing sustained enough to provide much light or heat for survival, but the spark is well-suited to lighting tinder for a campfire. [ACTION] north [STATE] The MAGIC FISH just swims deeper into the POOL, ignoring you. > REGARD EYE The PYREXIAN EYE, ripped from the skull of the strongest of the SLAVER KING'S beloved pets, is very warm to the touch, and but the slightest squeeze makes it flash briefly with flame. [ACTION] north [STATE] PHASIC SUMP The forest here is mucky and warm, surrounding a sinkhole filled with iridescent, gently glowing water. Some huge PIPES lead from here into the ground, and they drip with a similar strange water. There is a foul electric odor here, and your vision swims. You can feel your body being overtaken by weakness! You are weakening so quickly ... Your barbarian instinct is to get far from here ... [ACTION] north [STATE] IDOL SWAMP You stand in a dismal swamp, with the chitter of unpleasant life in every direction. Footing is torturous here, slowed by the grey murk sucking at your sandaled tread. There is a large, MOSSY STONE IDOL here. Even half-sunken in the mire, it stands a head taller than you, with crude, angry features. [ACTION] east [STATE] FROSTED UPLANDS Layers of frost and snow glitter on crags of ancient rock, and there are deep snowbanks to the north, approaching a BRIDGE made of pure ice, spanning a MIGHTY CREVASSE. Also seemingly made of ice is a beautiful CRYSTAL SPIRE, towering in the fading light, which you may ENTER. [ACTION] in [STATE] CRYSTAL SPIRE Inside the ice-like spire, it is strangely warm, and the air is charged with crackling energies, but magic or someting else? Know ye not. OUTSIDE, the FROSTED UPLANDS are only a fractured blur. From here, you can make your way UP to the EERIE PINNACLE, where strange lights play. [ACTION] up [STATE] CRYSTAL SPIRE Inside the ice-like spire, it is strangely warm, and the air is charged with crackling energies, but magic or someting else? Know ye not. [ACTION] up [STATE] EERIE PINNACLE You stand in the uppermost chamber of the strange crystalline tower. The air here is thick with energy and flooded with light from no particular source. There is a blinding whiteness, as if you're in a vast field of snow ... but the air is hot, not cold. Floating in mid-air is a beautiful NECKLACE OF STARLIGHT, a dazzling treasure! [ACTION] get necklace [STATE] EERIE PINNACLE You stand in the uppermost chamber of the strange crystalline tower. The air here is thick with energy and flooded with light from no particular source. There is a blinding whiteness, as if you're in a vast field of snow ... but the air is hot, not cold. Floating in mid-air is a beautiful NECKLACE OF STARLIGHT, a dazzling treasure! [ACTION] get necklace [STATE] Just as your fingertips brush the scintillating surface of the NECKLACE OF STARLIGHT, a sizzling shock throws you backward across the room! Crackling energies coalesce into a grinning, sparkling WRAITH of ELECTRO-PHASIC QUASIMATTER! A deadly VOLTAIC WRAITH! The VOLTAIC WRAITH misses, and hisses, and this is good news! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] Just as your fingertips brush the scintillating surface of the NECKLACE OF STARLIGHT, a sizzling shock throws you backward across the room! Crackling energies coalesce into a grinning, sparkling WRAITH of ELECTRO-PHASIC QUASIMATTER! A deadly VOLTAIC WRAITH! The VOLTAIC WRAITH misses, and hisses, and this is good news! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] By Huron's Palladian pagoda, a blow to be remembered! You scored 15 points of damage! The VOLTAIC WRAITH misses, and hisses, and this is good news! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] By Huron's Palladian pagoda, a blow to be remembered! You scored 15 points of damage! The VOLTAIC WRAITH misses, and hisses, and this is good news! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] You were too slow that time. A miss! The WRAITH attacks! You have suffered 13 hits of damage! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] You were too slow that time. A miss! The WRAITH attacks! You have suffered 13 hits of damage! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] Sa-ho! You give the VOLTAIC WRAITH a sampling of your TWO-HANDED SWORD, but good! You scored 10 points of damage! The VOLTAIC WRAITH lashes out with a bolt of DEADLY PHASIC ELECTRO-HATE! You have suffered 17 hits of damage! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] Sa-ho! You give the VOLTAIC WRAITH a sampling of your TWO-HANDED SWORD, but good! You scored 10 points of damage! The VOLTAIC WRAITH lashes out with a bolt of DEADLY PHASIC ELECTRO-HATE! You have suffered 17 hits of damage! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] A skillful attack if you do say so yourself! You scored 12 points of damage! The VOLTAIC WRAITH misses, and hisses, and this is good news! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] A skillful attack if you do say so yourself! You scored 12 points of damage! The VOLTAIC WRAITH misses, and hisses, and this is good news! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] By Huron's ghoulish bycocket, your TWO-HANDED SWORD lands home! You scored 6 points of damage! The VOLTAIC WRAITH unleashes twin arcs of STATIC IRE! You have suffered 19 hits of damage! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] By Huron's ghoulish bycocket, your TWO-HANDED SWORD lands home! You scored 6 points of damage! The VOLTAIC WRAITH unleashes twin arcs of STATIC IRE! You have suffered 19 hits of damage! [ACTION] attack wraith [STATE] Your foe is astonished by your speed as you strike hard! You scored 13 points of damage, leaving the VOLTAIC WRAITH at your mercy! The VOLTAIC WRAITH is defeated! The VOLTAIC WRAITH hisses and pops, and evaporates in a puff of acrid ozone. You hear a distant echo, an electric, sizzling voice: "BARBARIAN! I WILL ... RETURN ... FOR VENGEANCE!" Then, you hear the gentle report of girlish laughter. A very beautiful ELF girl, dressed in a tight white body-suit, calls out to you from high above, where she clings to the slick crystalline ceiling by some unknown magic! "Thank you, fair barbarian, for defeating the VOLTAIC WRAITH! I never could have done so on my own, and so, without you, I never could have obtained this NECKLACE OF STARLIGHT!" With a wink, she squirms out through a venting-hole in the crystal, and slides away into the snow, where she vanishes like a white rabbit. You hear a distant echo, an electric, sizzling voice: "BARBARIAN! I WILL ... RETURN ... FOR VENGEANCE!" Then, you hear the gentle report of girlish laughter. A very beautiful ELF girl, dressed in a tight white body-suit, calls out to you from high above, where she clings to the slick crystalline ceiling by some unknown magic! "Thank you, fair barbarian, for defeating the VOLTAIC WRAITH! I never could have done so on my own, and so, without you, I never could have obtained this NECKLACE OF STARLIGHT!" With a wink, she squirms out through a venting-hole in the crystal, and slides away into the snow, where she vanishes like a white rabbit. There is a blinding whiteness, as if you're in a vast field of snow ... but the air is hot, not cold. [ACTION] down [STATE] CRYSTAL SPIRE Inside the ice-like spire, it is strangely warm, and the air is charged with crackling energies, but magic or someting else? Know ye not. OUTSIDE, the FROSTED UPLANDS are only a fractured blur. From here, you can make your way UP to the EERIE PINNACLE, where strange lights play. [ACTION] out [STATE] CRYSTAL SPIRE Inside the ice-like spire, it is strangely warm, and the air is charged with crackling energies, but magic or someting else? Know ye not. OUTSIDE, the FROSTED UPLANDS are only a fractured blur. From here, you can make your way UP to the EERIE PINNACLE, where strange lights play. [ACTION] out [STATE] FROSTED UPLANDS Layers of frost and snow glitter on crags of ancient rock, and there are deep snowbanks to the north, approaching a BRIDGE made of pure ice, spanning a MIGHTY CREVASSE. Also seemingly made of ice is a beautiful CRYSTAL SPIRE, towering in the fading light, which you may ENTER. [ACTION] west [STATE] FROSTED UPLANDS Layers of frost and snow glitter on crags of ancient rock, and there are deep snowbanks to the north, approaching a BRIDGE made of pure ice, spanning a MIGHTY CREVASSE. Also seemingly made of ice is a beautiful CRYSTAL SPIRE, towering in the fading light, which you may ENTER. [ACTION] west [STATE] MOUNTAIN STREAM The pine trees have the first dustings of winter, here, and you espy much more snow to the east, in the FROSTED UPLANDS. The runoff feeds a briskly-flowing stream, which flows west toward the CASTLE. Marshier country lay to the south. A bit upstream from you, a GRIZZLY BEAR is fishing for food, but not having much luck. The BEAR doesn't seem hostile. [ACTION] east [STATE] MOUNTAIN STREAM The pine trees have the first dustings of winter, here, and you espy much more snow to the east, in the FROSTED UPLANDS. The runoff feeds a briskly-flowing stream, which flows west toward the CASTLE. Marshier country lay to the south. A bit upstream from you, a GRIZZLY BEAR is fishing for food, but not having much luck. The BEAR doesn't seem hostile. [ACTION] east [STATE] FROSTED UPLANDS Layers of frost and snow glitter on crags of ancient rock, and there are deep snowbanks to the north, approaching a BRIDGE made of pure ice, spanning a MIGHTY CREVASSE. Also seemingly made of ice is a beautiful CRYSTAL SPIRE, towering in the fading light, which you may ENTER. [ACTION] north [STATE] FROSTED UPLANDS Layers of frost and snow glitter on crags of ancient rock, and there are deep snowbanks to the north, approaching a BRIDGE made of pure ice, spanning a MIGHTY CREVASSE. Also seemingly made of ice is a beautiful CRYSTAL SPIRE, towering in the fading light, which you may ENTER. [ACTION] north [STATE] SNOWY MOUNTAINSIDE The snow on this mountain slope is all but undisturbed, and it glows a rich orange in the light of the setting sun. You can see that sun, far to the west, sinking into the sea. Its rays touch also on an ornate structure: You may (if you dare) ENTER a black TEMPLE to the Viraxian Demon-Gods. You hear a distant crackle, as if through the ELECTRIC ETHER, a sizzling note of hate! [ACTION] east [STATE] SNOWY MOUNTAINSIDE The snow on this mountain slope is all but undisturbed, and it glows a rich orange in the light of the setting sun. You can see that sun, far to the west, sinking into the sea. Its rays touch also on an ornate structure: You may (if you dare) ENTER a black TEMPLE to the Viraxian Demon-Gods. You hear a distant crackle, as if through the ELECTRIC ETHER, a sizzling note of hate! [ACTION] east [STATE] No good path leads that way, and thou art not of the Pioneer class! There is a sharp smell of ozone, and a faint electric sizzling in the air. [ACTION] in [STATE] No good path leads that way, and thou art not of the Pioneer class! There is a sharp smell of ozone, and a faint electric sizzling in the air. [ACTION] in [STATE] TEMPLE Your nostrils flare at the lingering smoke from incense, and at the strong scent of holy oils. The TEMPLE is ancient, cold and dark, with but dim shafts of smoky light from high windows. In the center of the room is an ALTAR, on which a SACRIFICE is being prepared. You can see the VIRAXIAN INCENSE, the ACOLYTE OF TRAGA and GINA THE VIRGIN SACRIFICE here. There is a sharp smell of ozone, and a faint electric sizzling can be heard nearby. [ACTION] use gladius on acolyte [STATE] TEMPLE Your nostrils flare at the lingering smoke from incense, and at the strong scent of holy oils. The TEMPLE is ancient, cold and dark, with but dim shafts of smoky light from high windows. In the center of the room is an ALTAR, on which a SACRIFICE is being prepared. You can see the VIRAXIAN INCENSE, the ACOLYTE OF TRAGA and GINA THE VIRGIN SACRIFICE here. There is a sharp smell of ozone, and a faint electric sizzling can be heard nearby. [ACTION] use gladius on acolyte [STATE] "Ah, barbarian, you have come with a GLADIUS SWORD in trade! This will be most useful in defending the TEMPLE from invaders. Please accept this valuable FIERY JEWEL and wander in peace." There is a sharp smell of ozone, and a faint electric sizzling can be heard nearby. [ACTION] parley with acolyte [STATE] "Ah, barbarian, you have come with a GLADIUS SWORD in trade! This will be most useful in defending the TEMPLE from invaders. Please accept this valuable FIERY JEWEL and wander in peace." There is a sharp smell of ozone, and a faint electric sizzling can be heard nearby. [ACTION] parley with acolyte [STATE] The ACOLYTE busies himself with holy matters, and has no time to chat further. There is a sharp smell of ozone, and a faint electric sizzling can be heard nearby. [ACTION] west [STATE] The ACOLYTE busies himself with holy matters, and has no time to chat further. There is a sharp smell of ozone, and a faint electric sizzling can be heard nearby. You can see that sun, far to the west, sinking into the sea. Its rays touch also on an ornate structure: You may (if you dare) ENTER a black TEMPLE to the Viraxian Demon-Gods. You can see a VOLTAIC WRAITH here. The VOLTAIC WRAITH misses, and hisses, and this is good news! YOU HAVE NOT SEEN THE LAST OF MY ELECTRO-SPITE!" Also seemingly made of ice is a beautiful CRYSTAL SPIRE, towering in the fading light, which you may ENTER. [ACTION] west [STATE] MOUNTAIN STREAM The pine trees have the first dustings of winter, here, and you espy much more snow to the east, in the FROSTED UPLANDS. The runoff feeds a briskly-flowing stream, which flows west toward the CASTLE. Marshier country lay to the south. A bit upstream from you, a GRIZZLY BEAR is fishing for food, but not having much luck. The BEAR doesn't seem hostile. [ACTION] west [STATE] OLD STONE BRIDGE This ancient bridge crosses a stream running down from the uplands to the east, and disappearing into a small CULVERT at the base of a cliff. This cliff, and the SLAVER KING'S CASTLE atop it, casts an icy shadow over the bridge. There is no path to the CASTLE from here, but the ROYAL ROAD lies to the north. [ACTION] west [STATE] OLD STONE BRIDGE This ancient bridge crosses a stream running down from the uplands to the east, and disappearing into a small CULVERT at the base of a cliff. This cliff, and the SLAVER KING'S CASTLE atop it, casts an icy shadow over the bridge. There is no path to the CASTLE from here, but the ROYAL ROAD lies to the north. [ACTION] west [STATE] No good path leads that way, and thou art not of the Pioneer class! [ACTION] south [STATE] No good path leads that way, and thou art not of the Pioneer class! [ACTION] south [STATE] OPEN PLAIN A gentle breeze ripples the sparse grasses here, under a blood-red sun. There are many paths. You see mountains to the distant east. You feel a manly twitching in your thews, enlivened by the freedom of the open country. [ACTION] west [STATE] OPEN PLAIN A gentle breeze ripples the sparse grasses here, under a blood-red sun. There are many paths. You see mountains to the distant east. You feel a manly twitching in your thews, enlivened by the freedom of the open country. [ACTION] west [STATE] FARMER'S GREEN A humble WELL provides a centerpiece for this quiet place, surrounded by farmland providing food for the port town to the west. To the north, the shadow of the SLAVER KING'S CASTLE blots out part of the evening sky, but there's no path there from here. [ACTION] west [STATE] FARMER'S GREEN A humble WELL provides a centerpiece for this quiet place, surrounded by farmland providing food for the port town to the west. To the north, the shadow of the SLAVER KING'S CASTLE blots out part of the evening sky, but there's no path there from here. [ACTION] west [STATE] BUSTLING PORT You tread carefully, here. This is the city of the SLAVER KING, and he may have spies anywhere! Fortunately, the crowd here at the docks is a varied, noisy mass of people and creatures from all corners of Vanth. The MARKETPLACE further north surrounds the CASTLE entrance. The DARK ALLEYWAY immediately south might offer shelter if the guards come running. A GROUP OF PIRATES stands around the gangplank of a mighty PIRATE SHIP, deciding who may or may not go IN. [ACTION] south [STATE] BUSTLING PORT You tread carefully, here. This is the city of the SLAVER KING, and he may have spies anywhere! Fortunately, the crowd here at the docks is a varied, noisy mass of people and creatures from all corners of Vanth. The MARKETPLACE further north surrounds the CASTLE entrance. The DARK ALLEYWAY immediately south might offer shelter if the guards come running. A GROUP OF PIRATES stands around the gangplank of a mighty PIRATE SHIP, deciding who may or may not go IN. [ACTION] south [STATE] DARK ALLEYWAY Places like this wretched ALLEYWAY make you yearn for the clean air and freedom of the open country. Buildings lean against one another, far above your head, and RATS scurry around the base of a large BARREL. To the north lay the bustling quayside. To the south, you could easily scramble over the city wall and up a brambly hill. Light shines from a half-open doorway nearby, you could go IN if you wanted. The air from the doorway smells of subtle perfumes and spices. [ACTION] in [STATE] DARK ALLEYWAY Places like this wretched ALLEYWAY make you yearn for the clean air and freedom of the open country. Buildings lean against one another, far above your head, and RATS scurry around the base of a large BARREL. To the north lay the bustling quayside. To the south, you could easily scramble over the city wall and up a brambly hill. Light shines from a half-open doorway nearby, you could go IN if you wanted. The air from the doorway smells of subtle perfumes and spices. [ACTION] in [STATE] PERFUMED BOUDOIR You find yourself in a soft maze of colored veils, leading to a large bed piled with furs and cloth pillows. There are no candles or oil-lamps here, but rather globes of red glass lit by magic, pulsing with the rhythm of soft music. The DELICATE DOXY reclines on the bed, REGARDING you quietly, grinning playfully, and chewing on a bit of her auburn hair. "Hello again, barbarian," she says. [ACTION] use jewel on doxy [STATE] PERFUMED BOUDOIR You find yourself in a soft maze of colored veils, leading to a large bed piled with furs and cloth pillows. There are no candles or oil-lamps here, but rather globes of red glass lit by magic, pulsing with the rhythm of soft music. The DELICATE DOXY reclines on the bed, REGARDING you quietly, grinning playfully, and chewing on a bit of her auburn hair. "Hello again, barbarian," she says. [ACTION] use jewel on doxy [STATE] "Oh, barbarian!" the lass coos, running her finger across the surface of the gem, inspiring sparks to coil beneath its surface. "'Tis none other than a Vulkin Amber Sapphire! Long have I coveted such a thing!" She looks you up and down, and quietly closes the boudoir door. "This will buy you many unusual pleasures ..." ... Many hours (and many unusual pleasures) later, VESSA THE DELICATE DOXY lay naked beside you, tracing a finger along your corded neck and regarding your physique with silent amusement. After a time, she speaks: "Barbarian, your mien leaves no mistake and while I am but young, I am wise in the ways of the court, for many of the SLAVER KING'S lords do visit to play in my PERFUMED BOUDOIR. I have heard tell of a barbarian who escaped from the slave-caravan, a barbarian with fire in his eyes ... eyes that might look eagerly toward bloody vengeance on the SLAVER KING. What say you?" Reading your silence, the DOXY draws out a SCROLL from beneath her pillow. "Here are some notes I've kept, young lion, young panther, young upland ecru-spotted lynx, some other ... rumors ... that may be of use to one brave enough to challenge a kingdom." She stares into your eyes. "I believe that such a man as you (she says this with a growling purr) may indeed be a threat to the SLAVER KING, and the SLAVER KING treats Doxies most cruelly. I would love to see him punished." ... Many more hours (and etc) later, you emerge from the DOXY's chambers, sated and well-pleased, and scented with jasmine and feminine ardour. (press a key when ready) DARK ALLEYWAY Places like this wretched ALLEYWAY make you yearn for the clean air and freedom of the open country. Buildings lean against one another, far above your head, and RATS scurry around the base of a large BARREL. To the north lay the bustling quayside. To the south, you could easily scramble over the city wall and up a brambly hill. Light shines from a half-open doorway nearby, you could go IN if you wanted. The air from the doorway smells of subtle perfumes and spices. Many hours (and many unusual pleasures) later, VESSA THE DELICATE DOXY lay naked beside you, tracing a finger along your corded neck and regarding your physique with silent amusement. After a time, she speaks: "Barbarian, your mien leaves no mistake and while I am but young, I am wise in the ways of the court, for many of the SLAVER KING'S lords do visit to play in my PERFUMED BOUDOIR. I have heard tell of a barbarian who escaped from the slave-caravan, a barbarian with fire in his eyes ... eyes that might look eagerly toward bloody vengeance on the SLAVER KING. What say you?" Reading your silence, the DOXY draws out a SCROLL from beneath her pillow. "Here are some notes I've kept, young lion, young panther, young upland ecru-spotted lynx, some other ... rumors ... that may be of use to one brave enough to challenge a kingdom." She stares into your eyes. "I believe that such a man as you (she says this with a growling purr) may indeed be a threat to the SLAVER KING, and the SLAVER KING treats Doxies most cruelly. I would love to see him punished." ... Many more hours (and etc) later, you emerge from the DOXY's chambers, sated and well-pleased, and scented with jasmine and feminine ardour. (press a key when ready) DARK ALLEYWAY Places like this wretched ALLEYWAY make you yearn for the clean air and freedom of the open country. Buildings lean against one another, far above your head, and RATS scurry around the base of a large BARREL. To the north lay the bustling quayside. To the south, you could easily scramble over the city wall and up a brambly hill. Light shines from a half-open doorway nearby, you could go IN if you wanted. The air from the doorway smells of subtle perfumes and spices. [ACTION] regard scroll [STATE] The SCROLL is perfumed with a delicate touch, gilt at the edges, and decorated with lovely script that flows over and under itself in a way you find most enchanting. You have never learned to read these complex runes of the civilized realms, but even a man such as you can be awed by such artful penmanship. The simpler runes at the top say SECRETS OF STATE. [ACTION] regard secrets of state [STATE] The SCROLL is perfumed with a delicate touch, gilt at the edges, and decorated with lovely script that flows over and under itself in a way you find most enchanting. You have never learned to read these complex runes of the civilized realms, but even a man such as you can be awed by such artful penmanship. The simpler runes at the top say SECRETS OF STATE. [ACTION] regard secrets of state [STATE] The SCROLL is perfumed with a delicate touch, gilt at the edges, and decorated with lovely script that flows over and under itself in a way you find most enchanting. You have never learned to read these complex runes of the civilized realms, but even a man such as you can be awed by such artful penmanship. The simpler runes at the top say SECRETS OF STATE. > I You bear the following (both on your person and stashed in your trusty THESKIAN DUFFEL BAG): the SECRETS OF STATE, a PYREXIAN EYE, a DELICATELY-OILED CLOTH, a SLAB OF SNOW-SERPENT MEAT, a TWO-HANDED SWORD (held at the ready), an EAR OF CORN, a SUIT OF CHAINMAIL ARMOR (being worn), some STINKY BAIT, a SUIT OF BURLAP ARMOR (currently un-used) and a FLASHLIGHT. [ACTION] east [STATE] The SCROLL is perfumed with a delicate touch, gilt at the edges, and decorated with lovely script that flows over and under itself in a way you find most enchanting. You have never learned to read these complex runes of the civilized realms, but even a man such as you can be awed by such artful penmanship. The simpler runes at the top say SECRETS OF STATE. > I You bear the following (both on your person and stashed in your trusty THESKIAN DUFFEL BAG): the SECRETS OF STATE, a PYREXIAN EYE, a DELICATELY-OILED CLOTH, a SLAB OF SNOW-SERPENT MEAT, a TWO-HANDED SWORD (held at the ready), an EAR OF CORN, a SUIT OF CHAINMAIL ARMOR (being worn), some STINKY BAIT, a SUIT OF BURLAP ARMOR (currently un-used) and a FLASHLIGHT. [ACTION] east [STATE] No good path leads that way, and thou art not of the Pioneer class! [ACTION] south [STATE] No good path leads that way, and thou art not of the Pioneer class! [ACTION] south [STATE] GRAVEYARD This dismal GRAVEYARD sits on a hill cloaked in mist, overlooking the SLAVER KING'S seedy SEAPORT to the north. There are hundreds of gravestones, some cracked with centuries of age, some quite new. There is a single large TOMB that a brave soul might choose to ENTER. [ACTION] east [STATE] GRAVEYARD This dismal GRAVEYARD sits on a hill cloaked in mist, overlooking the SLAVER KING'S seedy SEAPORT to the north. There are hundreds of gravestones, some cracked with centuries of age, some quite new. There is a single large TOMB that a brave soul might choose to ENTER. [ACTION] east [STATE] ROCKY RUIN Cracked remnants of walls and a stretch of weed-grown cobblestones tell of an old temple or abbey ... perhaps even a village. Whatever it was, it now lies in ROCKY RUIN. Poking through the remnants, you notice a shadowy archway leading IN to one small structure that remains intact. Simply walking IN, however, isn't currently an option, as a vast RUIN SLUG - the largest you've ever seen - is basking its slimy bulk in the evening sun, right near the entrance. The SLUG makes no move toward you, but you'd have to ASSAIL it (and survive) to find out what lay beyond the arch. You can also see a TELEPHONE POLE here. [ACTION] assail pole [STATE] ROCKY RUIN Cracked remnants of walls and a stretch of weed-grown cobblestones tell of an old temple or abbey ... perhaps even a village. Whatever it was, it now lies in ROCKY RUIN. Poking through the remnants, you notice a shadowy archway leading IN to one small structure that remains intact. Simply walking IN, however, isn't currently an option, as a vast RUIN SLUG - the largest you've ever seen - is basking its slimy bulk in the evening sun, right near the entrance. The SLUG makes no move toward you, but you'd have to ASSAIL it (and survive) to find out what lay beyond the arch. You can also see a TELEPHONE POLE here. [ACTION] assail pole [STATE] The TELEPHONE POLE is not your foe, barbarian. [ACTION] east [STATE] The TELEPHONE POLE is not your foe, barbarian. [ACTION] east [STATE] DIZZYING CLIFFSIDE This is the edge of a great cliff, looking over a vast CHASM to the south. The mists are so heavy within that you can barely detect a raging river far, far below. A tiny TREE clings tenaciously to the edge of the cliff. [ACTION] examine tree [STATE] DIZZYING CLIFFSIDE This is the edge of a great cliff, looking over a vast CHASM to the south. The mists are so heavy within that you can barely detect a raging river far, far below. A tiny TREE clings tenaciously to the edge of the cliff. [ACTION] examine tree [STATE] The leaves are all gone, but a single small FRUIT hangs from the farthest tip of the farthest branch, out over the CHASM. [ACTION] examine river [STATE] The leaves are all gone, but a single small FRUIT hangs from the farthest tip of the farthest branch, out over the CHASM. [ACTION] examine river [STATE] It is all mist in the deeps of the CHASM, but here at the edge, the orange glow of the evening sun highlights the cliffsides. You suppose that on the other side there lay either the EMPIRE OF DARTH VIRAXIS or one of the rival SLAVER KINGDOMS. These are matters you can clarify once the SLAVER KING of this particular realm lay dead by your vengeful hand. [ACTION] east [STATE] It is all mist in the deeps of the CHASM, but here at the edge, the orange glow of the evening sun highlights the cliffsides. You suppose that on the other side there lay either the EMPIRE OF DARTH VIRAXIS or one of the rival SLAVER KINGDOMS. These are matters you can clarify once the SLAVER KING of this particular realm lay dead by your vengeful hand. [ACTION] east [STATE] PRISMATIC SPRAY A high WATERFALL cascades down from a mountain ridge above, foaming and roaring into a broad POOL of clean water. The result is a brilliant PRISMATIC SPRAY. The setting is very peaceful. Swimming in the crystalline POOL is a MAGIC FISH, swimming a lazy figure-eight. [ACTION] examine spray [STATE] PRISMATIC SPRAY A high WATERFALL cascades down from a mountain ridge above, foaming and roaring into a broad POOL of clean water. The result is a brilliant PRISMATIC SPRAY. The setting is very peaceful. Swimming in the crystalline POOL is a MAGIC FISH, swimming a lazy figure-eight. [ACTION] examine spray [STATE] The WATERFALL cascades down from streams high up toward MOUNT GELIDUS. It's very lovely and refreshing. There's almost nowhere to stand, here, where you aren't catching some spray. You spot a rare STEELWING BUTTERFLY resting on a nearby stone, but it flutters away before you can catch it. [ACTION] north [STATE] 'Tis unworthy of thy manly attentions. [ACTION] north [STATE] PHASIC SUMP The forest here is mucky and warm, surrounding a sinkhole filled with iridescent, gently glowing water. Some huge PIPES lead from here into the ground, and they drip with a similar strange water. There is a foul electric odor here, and your vision swims. You can feel your body being overtaken by weakness! You are weakening so quickly ... Your barbarian instinct is to get far from here ... [ACTION] north [STATE] PHASIC SUMP The forest here is mucky and warm, surrounding a sinkhole filled with iridescent, gently glowing water. Some huge PIPES lead from here into the ground, and they drip with a similar strange water. There is a foul electric odor here, and your vision swims. You can feel your body being overtaken by weakness! You are weakening so quickly ... Your barbarian instinct is to get far from here ... [ACTION] north [STATE] IDOL SWAMP You stand in a dismal swamp, with the chitter of unpleasant life in every direction. Footing is torturous here, slowed by the grey murk sucking at your sandaled tread. There is a large, MOSSY STONE IDOL here. Even half-sunken in the mire, it stands a head taller than you, with crude, angry features. [ACTION] get moss [STATE] IDOL SWAMP You stand in a dismal swamp, with the chitter of unpleasant life in every direction. Footing is torturous here, slowed by the grey murk sucking at your sandaled tread. There is a large, MOSSY STONE IDOL here. Even half-sunken in the mire, it stands a head taller than you, with crude, angry features. [ACTION] get moss [STATE] The MOSSY STONE IDOL is vast and you are but mortal. [ACTION] west [STATE] The MOSSY STONE IDOL is vast and you are but mortal. [ACTION] west [STATE] OPEN PLAIN A gentle breeze ripples the sparse grasses here, under a blood-red sun. There are many paths. You see mountains to the distant east. You feel a manly twitching in your thews, enlivened by the freedom of the open country. [ACTION] north [STATE] MOUNTAIN STREAM The pine trees have the first dustings of winter, here, and you espy much more snow to the east, in the FROSTED UPLANDS. The runoff feeds a briskly-flowing stream, which flows west toward the CASTLE. Marshier country lay to the south. A bit upstream from you, a GRIZZLY BEAR is fishing for food, but not having much luck. The BEAR doesn't seem hostile. [ACTION] examine tree [STATE] MOUNTAIN STREAM The pine trees have the first dustings of winter, here, and you espy much more snow to the east, in the FROSTED UPLANDS. [ACTION] examine tree [STATE] The TREES are much like any TREES, and they smelleth nice. [ACTION] get tree [STATE] The TREES are much like any TREES, and they smelleth nice. [ACTION] get tree [STATE] When thy saga is writ and thy story told and maidens swoon to hear it, the tale-tellers will, in kindness and in mercy, skip the part where the TREES hath distracted thee so. [ACTION] west [STATE] OLD STONE BRIDGE This ancient bridge crosses a stream running down from the uplands to the east, and disappearing into a small CULVERT at the base of a cliff. This cliff, and the SLAVER KING'S CASTLE atop it, casts an icy shadow over the bridge. There is no path to the CASTLE from here, but the ROYAL ROAD lies to the north. [ACTION] west [STATE] FARMER'S GREEN A humble WELL provides a centerpiece for this quiet place, surrounded by farmland providing food for the port town to the west. To the north, the shadow of the SLAVER KING'S CASTLE blots out part of the evening sky, but there's no path there from here. [ACTION] west [STATE] I've seen this tragedy before. The alluring proximity of a WELL can drive many a hero to gibbering madness. The ground is unusually soft; you have to pick up your feet to keep from sinking. [ACTION] west [STATE] BUSTLING PORT You tread carefully, here. This is the city of the SLAVER KING, and he may have spies anywhere! Fortunately, the crowd here at the docks is a varied, noisy mass of people and creatures from all corners of Vanth. The MARKETPLACE further north surrounds the CASTLE entrance. The DARK ALLEYWAY immediately south might offer shelter if the guards come running. A GROUP OF PIRATES stands around the gangplank of a mighty PIRATE SHIP, deciding who may or may not go IN. [ACTION] north [STATE] BUSTLING PORT You tread carefully, here. [ACTION] north [STATE] MARKETPLACE This busy MARKETPLACE is the heart of the town, nestled against the mighty GATES of the CASTLE. You are careful to keep a low profile here, directly beneath the looming facade of the SLAVER KING'S own citadel. A lone GUARD stands watch before the GATES, staring ahead dutifully and ignoring the throng of the MARKETPLACE. [ACTION] north [STATE] SEASHORE An elderly LIGHTHOUSE is here (you could go IN), warning ships against the dangers of the rocky coastline. This stretch includes some soft sand as well as rocks ... a small beach looking out on the SEA OF GREAT PERIL. Over some bluffs to the immediate south, you can hear the sounds of the SLAVER KING'S harbor town. To the east are some pines. HARK! You hear a girlish SCREAM from the nearby PINE FOREST! [ACTION] east [STATE] PINE FOREST This is a peaceful forest of tall pines, with a well-worn road leading west, toward the SEASHORE, and east. There is a SOLID GOLD STATUE here, gently shaded by the PINE TREES along the side of the road. The entire area is draped in gauzy, oversized WEBS of sticky translucence. [ACTION] east [STATE] ROYAL ROAD The SLAVER KING maintains this plank-paved highway for the good of his fat merchants, using slave labor. It is built on the backs of your people, and of any others his slave-catchers can beat into submission. Legend has it that a part of this road runs all the way distant to the UNKNOWN HIGHWAY! From here, however, it runs east to an ABANDONED QUARRY, and west into the pine-woods north of the CASTLE. [ACTION] east [STATE] ROYAL ROAD The SLAVER KING maintains this plank-paved highway for the good of his fat merchants, using slave labor. It is built on the backs of your people, and of any others his slave-catchers can beat into submission. Legend has it that a part of this road runs all the way distant to the UNKNOWN HIGHWAY! From here, however, it runs east to an ABANDONED QUARRY, and west into the pine-woods north of the CASTLE. [ACTION] east [STATE] ABANDONED QUARRY This vast pit stands in the shadow of the snow-capped mountains to the east. It was here that the great stones were quarried to build the CASTLE of the SLAVER KING, and the walls of the nearby harbor town. The site is long-abandoned, or so it's told ... But you hear a riotous and happy din DOWN in the GRAVEL PIT. [ACTION] down [STATE] ABANDONED QUARRY This vast pit stands in the shadow of the snow-capped mountains to the east. It was here that the great stones were quarried to build the CASTLE of the SLAVER KING, and the walls of the nearby harbor town. The site is long-abandoned, or so it's told ... But you hear a riotous and happy din DOWN in the GRAVEL PIT. [ACTION] down [STATE] GRAVEL PIT OF ROGUES Sa-ho! By Huron's fibrillating uvula, this is a party! Here in this GRAVEL PIT, a collection of rowdies and jackanapes have made an outlaw camp, with drink and music and fighting galore! The center of attention seems to be a GLADIATOR'S RING. You see a nearby CHALLENGE POST, and a PARTY OF ROGUES stands by, engaged in revels and high jinks. [ACTION] examine post [STATE] GRAVEL PIT OF ROGUES Sa-ho! By Huron's fibrillating uvula, this is a party! Here in this GRAVEL PIT, a collection of rowdies and jackanapes have made an outlaw camp, with drink and music and fighting galore! The center of attention seems to be a GLADIATOR'S RING. You see a nearby CHALLENGE POST, and a PARTY OF ROGUES stands by, engaged in revels and high jinks. [ACTION] examine post [STATE] The CHALLENGE POST is a wooden pole hung with dyed banners, each representing a GLADIATOR willing to meet challengers. Beginning with the lowest, the banners are BLUE, GREEN, GOLD, and RED. There is room for one more banner above the others, but RED is presently the highest on the POST. A nearby rogue espies your curiosity, and sayeth "If ye wish a bout, barbarian, SEIZE the banner of your chosen foe, to display your challenge!" [ACTION] seize green [STATE] The CHALLENGE POST is a wooden pole hung with dyed banners, each representing a GLADIATOR willing to meet challengers. Beginning with the lowest, the banners are BLUE, GREEN, GOLD, and RED. There is room for one more banner above the others, but RED is presently the highest on the POST. A nearby rogue espies your curiosity, and sayeth "If ye wish a bout, barbarian, SEIZE the banner of your chosen foe, to display your challenge!" [ACTION] seize green [STATE] As you pluck the GREEN BANNER from the CHALLENGE POST, the assembled rowdies cheer! You are ushered into the gladiator's ring, where you stand face-to-face with the famed Klengon Criminal, THRANG! "Prepare for mighty battle, barbarian!" he shouts, and cracks an arrogant grin. You take a moment to REGARD your opponent ... THRANG is a regal-looking KLENGON, with a mustache so long he tucks it into his belt. He wields an impressive KLENGON WAR HAMMER as if he were born to maim weaker men with it. [ACTION] assail thrang [STATE] By Huron's terrifying tirades, a blow to be remembered! You scored 12 points of damage, leaving THRANG at your mercy! THRANG is defeated! (press a key when ready) With your final blow, THRANG is cast to the dust and gravel, his body bloodied, his towering ego reduced considerably. The crowd erupts in cheers, and you accept their ale and accolades. Extending the hand of fellowship to your foe, you help THRANG to his feet, and he smiles a grudging smile. "You are a worthy foe, barbarian. You fight like a true KLENGON." The crowd cheers again, and you nod in silent assent. THRANG bows in respect, and wanders away to heal for a while, and eventually the crowd returns to their revels. (press a key when ready) GRAVEL PIT OF ROGUES Sa-ho! By Huron's painless paludism, this is a party! Here in this GRAVEL PIT, a collection of rowdies and jackanapes have made an outlaw camp, with drink and music and fighting galore! The center of attention seems to be a GLADIATOR'S RING. You see a nearby CHALLENGE POST, and a PARTY OF ROGUES stands by, engaged in revels and high jinks. [ACTION] examine rogues [STATE] By Huron's terrifying tirades, a blow to be remembered! You scored 12 points of damage, leaving THRANG at your mercy! THRANG is defeated! (press a key when ready) With your final blow, THRANG is cast to the dust and gravel, his body bloodied, his towering ego reduced considerably. The crowd erupts in cheers, and you accept their ale and accolades. Extending the hand of fellowship to your foe, you help THRANG to his feet, and he smiles a grudging smile. "You are a worthy foe, barbarian. You fight like a true KLENGON." The crowd cheers again, and you nod in silent assent. THRANG bows in respect, and wanders away to heal for a while, and eventually the crowd returns to their revels. (press a key when ready) GRAVEL PIT OF ROGUES Sa-ho! By Huron's painless paludism, this is a party! Here in this GRAVEL PIT, a collection of rowdies and jackanapes have made an outlaw camp, with drink and music and fighting galore! The center of attention seems to be a GLADIATOR'S RING. You see a nearby CHALLENGE POST, and a PARTY OF ROGUES stands by, engaged in revels and high jinks. [ACTION] examine rogues [STATE] The PARTY OF ROGUES seem quite the band of ne'er do wells! [ACTION] up [STATE] The PARTY OF ROGUES seem quite the band of ne'er do wells! [ACTION] up [STATE] ABANDONED QUARRY This vast pit stands in the shadow of the snow-capped mountains to the east. It was here that the great stones were quarried to build the CASTLE of the SLAVER KING, and the walls of the nearby harbor town. The site is long-abandoned, or so it's told ... But you hear a riotous and happy din DOWN in the GRAVEL PIT. [ACTION] east [STATE] ABANDONED QUARRY This vast pit stands in the shadow of the snow-capped mountains to the east. [ACTION] south [STATE] MOUNTAIN STREAM The pine trees have the first dustings of winter, here, and you espy much more snow to the east, in the FROSTED UPLANDS. The runoff feeds a briskly-flowing stream, which flows west toward the CASTLE. Marshier country lay to the south. A bit upstream from you, a GRIZZLY BEAR is fishing for food, but not having much luck. The BEAR doesn't seem hostile. A bit upstream from you, a GRIZZLY BEAR is fishing for food, but not having much luck. The BEAR doesn't seem hostile. [ACTION] west [STATE] OLD STONE BRIDGE This ancient bridge crosses a stream running down from the uplands to the east, and disappearing into a small CULVERT at the base of a cliff. This cliff, and the SLAVER KING'S CASTLE atop it, casts an icy shadow over the bridge. There is no path to the CASTLE from here, but the ROYAL ROAD lies to the north. [ACTION] south [STATE] OPEN PLAIN A gentle breeze ripples the sparse grasses here, under a blood-red sun. There are many paths. You see mountains to the distant east. [ACTION] south [STATE] CARRED FOREST The remains of FALLEN TREES are here, overgrown with ferns and surrounding a half-buried shack of once-fine metal, draped with canvas and pocked with rust. You are wise in the ways of these: they are the "space-ships" that brought men from dark places in the sky, ere they fell. You notice a hatchway hanging open; you could ENTER if you so desired. This remnant of a ROCKET seems abandoned, apart from a tired-looking metallic figure slumped against its side ... You can see a ROBODROID here. [ACTION] regard trees [STATE] CARRED FOREST The remains of FALLEN TREES are here, overgrown with ferns and surrounding a half-buried shack of once-fine metal, draped with canvas and pocked with rust. [ACTION] regard trees [STATE] The "space-ship" tore many trees from their roots when it fell here. They lie here still, creating an unnatural clearing in the forest. They are now overgrown with flowers, ferns, and mosses. [ACTION] seize trees [STATE] The "space-ship" tore many trees from their roots when it fell here. [ACTION] seize trees [STATE] Thy savage might and lust for vengeance could be put to better use than that, barbarian. [ACTION] south [STATE] DIZZYING CLIFFSIDE This is the edge of a great cliff, looking over a vast CHASM to the south. The mists are so heavy within that you can barely detect a raging river far, far below. A tiny TREE clings tenaciously to the edge of the cliff. [ACTION] west [STATE] DIZZYING CLIFFSIDE This is the edge of a great cliff, looking over a vast CHASM to the south. The mists are so heavy within that you can barely detect a raging river far, far below. A tiny TREE clings tenaciously to the edge of the cliff. [ACTION] west [STATE] ROCKY RUIN Cracked remnants of walls and a stretch of weed-grown cobblestones tell of an old temple or abbey ... perhaps even a village. Whatever it was, it now lies in ROCKY RUIN. Poking through the remnants, you notice a shadowy archway leading IN to one small structure that remains intact. Simply walking IN, however, isn't currently an option, as a vast RUIN SLUG - the largest you've ever seen - is basking its slimy bulk in the evening sun, right near the entrance. The SLUG makes no move toward you, but you'd have to ASSAIL it (and survive) to find out what lay beyond the arch. You can also see a TELEPHONE POLE here. [ACTION] regard pole [STATE] ROCKY RUIN Cracked remnants of walls and a stretch of weed-grown cobblestones tell of an old temple or abbey ... perhaps even a village. The SLUG makes no move toward you, but you'd have to ASSAIL it (and survive) to find out what lay beyond the arch. You can also see a TELEPHONE POLE here. [ACTION] regard pole [STATE] The TELEPHONE POLE seems quite sturdy, and its runes name it "BELL SYSTEMS OF DETROIT." A potent blessing of magic, no doubt. [ACTION] use pole [STATE] The TELEPHONE POLE seems quite sturdy, and its runes name it "BELL SYSTEMS OF DETROIT." A potent blessing of magic, no doubt. [ACTION] regard archway [STATE] The RUINS bespeak of a life unlike your own, and all is too far gone to learn much from looking. [ACTION] assail archway [STATE] The RUINS bespeak of a life unlike your own, and all is too far gone to learn much from looking. [ACTION] assail archway [STATE] When thy saga is writ and thy story told and maidens swoon to hear it, the tale-tellers will, in kindness and in mercy, skip the part where the DEBRIS hath distracted thee so. [ACTION] north [STATE] LONELY HILL Forest surrounds this hill on all sides, but there are no trees at the top - only grass and a few sad flowers, bending toward the setting sun. You see farmland to the north, and the CASTLE of the SLAVER KING looming high above. To the west is the harbor TOWN, but there's no good path from here. [ACTION] east [STATE] IDOL SWAMP You stand in a dismal swamp, with the chitter of unpleasant life in every direction. Footing is torturous here, slowed by the grey murk sucking at your sandaled tread. There is a large, MOSSY STONE IDOL here. Even half-sunken in the mire, it stands a head taller than you, with crude, angry features. Also seemingly made of ice is a beautiful CRYSTAL SPIRE, towering in the fading light, which you may ENTER. [ACTION] north [STATE] SNOWY MOUNTAINSIDE The snow on this mountain slope is all but undisturbed, and it glows a rich orange in the light of the setting sun. You can see that sun, far to the west, sinking into the sea. Its rays touch also on an ornate structure: You may (if you dare) ENTER a black TEMPLE to the Viraxian Demon-Gods. You hear a distant crackle, as if through the ELECTRIC ETHER, a sizzling note of hate! You can see the VIRAXIAN INCENSE, the ACOLYTE OF TRAGA and GINA THE VIRGIN SACRIFICE here. "The incense is sacred to our faith, barbarian. I would never give it up cheaply ... I would only trade the INCENSE for something of real value in advancing my ambitions, something I could hang over the heads of those foolish lords who serve the SLAVER KING." This is the city of the SLAVER KING, and he may have spies anywhere! Fortunately, the crowd here at the docks is a varied, noisy mass of people and creatures from all corners of Vanth. The MARKETPLACE further north surrounds the CASTLE entrance. The DARK ALLEYWAY immediately south might offer shelter if the guards come running. A GROUP OF PIRATES stands around the gangplank of a mighty PIRATE SHIP, deciding who may or may not go IN. [ACTION] north [STATE] BUSTLING PORT You tread carefully, here. This is the city of the SLAVER KING, and he may have spies anywhere! Fortunately, the crowd here at the docks is a varied, noisy mass of people and creatures from all corners of Vanth. [ACTION] north [STATE] MARKETPLACE This busy MARKETPLACE is the heart of the town, nestled against the mighty GATES of the CASTLE. You are careful to keep a low profile here, directly beneath the looming facade of the SLAVER KING'S own citadel. A lone GUARD stands watch before the GATES, staring ahead dutifully and ignoring the throng of the MARKETPLACE. [ACTION] north [STATE] MARKETPLACE This busy MARKETPLACE is the heart of the town, nestled against the mighty GATES of the CASTLE. You are careful to keep a low profile here, directly beneath the looming facade of the SLAVER KING'S own citadel. A lone GUARD stands watch before the GATES, staring ahead dutifully and ignoring the throng of the MARKETPLACE. [ACTION] north [STATE] SEASHORE An elderly LIGHTHOUSE is here (you could go IN), warning ships against the dangers of the rocky coastline. This stretch includes some soft sand as well as rocks ... a small beach looking out on the SEA OF GREAT PERIL. Over some bluffs to the immediate south, you can hear the sounds of the SLAVER KING'S harbor town. To the east are some pines. [ACTION] use bait on sea [STATE] SEASHORE An elderly LIGHTHOUSE is here (you could go IN), warning ships against the dangers of the rocky coastline. This stretch includes some soft sand as well as rocks ... a small beach looking out on the SEA OF GREAT PERIL. Over some bluffs to the immediate south, you can hear the sounds of the SLAVER KING'S harbor town. To the east are some pines. [ACTION] use bait on sea [STATE] The STINKY BAIT is truly foul, but sometimes a man just feels the urge to expose his skin, smear it with rotted bait, bare it to the ocean and see if anything interesting happens. It's how your parents met. For a few minutes, the only noticeable effect is a migration of all the seabirds, who head to the harbor where the stench is more civilized. But then there is a visible movement out at sea ... a rising darkness in the clear green waters which resolves itself to a speeding mountain of scaly flesh, an errant island of rippling water washing over green-black muscle and sudden, fire-bright yellow eyes. When the ENORMOUS SEA-MONSTER rises out of the water, you wonder for a moment how the ocean ever contained it. It's larger than the nearby city! And then it eats you. (press a key when ready) SEA-MONSTER'S GULLET The floor is the squishy flesh of a monstrous gullet. The walls are the squishy flesh of a monstrous gullet. The ceiling is the squishy flesh of a monstrous gullet ... and the DIGESTIVE JUICES are rising to consume you. You can see a HALF-DIGESTED CORPSE bobbing in the rising, sizzling acid - the remains of some old sailor, you suppose. On the CORPSE you notice the EYEPATCH OF ODIN and FLESH-TOTEM OF DARTH VIRAXIS. You can feel your flesh sizzling as the DIGESTIVE JUICES continue to rise ... [ACTION] regard corpse [STATE] The STINKY BAIT is truly foul, but sometimes a man just feels the urge to expose his skin, smear it with rotted bait, bare it to the ocean and see if anything interesting happens. It's how your parents met. For a few minutes, the only noticeable effect is a migration of all the seabirds, who head to the harbor where the stench is more civilized. But then there is a visible movement out at sea ... a rising darkness in the clear green waters which resolves itself to a speeding mountain of scaly flesh, an errant island of rippling water washing over green-black muscle and sudden, fire-bright yellow eyes. When the ENORMOUS SEA-MONSTER rises out of the water, you wonder for a moment how the ocean ever contained it. It's larger than the nearby city! And then it eats you. You can feel your flesh sizzling as the DIGESTIVE JUICES continue to rise ... [ACTION] regard corpse [STATE] It's the finest example of a HALF-DIGESTED CORPSE you've seen since you were enslaved. You can feel your flesh sizzling as the DIGESTIVE JUICES continue to rise ... [ACTION] pillage [STATE] It's the finest example of a HALF-DIGESTED CORPSE you've seen since you were enslaved. You can feel your flesh sizzling as the DIGESTIVE JUICES continue to rise ... [ACTION] pillage [STATE] EYEPATCH OF ODIN: Seized. FLESH-TOTEM OF DARTH VIRAXIS: Seized. You can feel your flesh sizzling as the DIGESTIVE JUICES continue to rise ... [ACTION] use eye on incense [STATE] With a lick of flame from the decomposing eyeball, the incense takes to light briefly, then to slow ash, and begins releasing fragrant smoke. As the smoke from the incense curls away into darkness, you hear a pained rumbling from the SEA MONSTER. You can feel your flesh sizzling as the DIGESTIVE JUICES continue to rise ... [ACTION] wait [STATE] With a lick of flame from the decomposing eyeball, the incense takes to light briefly, then to slow ash, and begins releasing fragrant smoke. As the smoke from the incense curls away into darkness, you hear a pained rumbling from the SEA MONSTER. You can feel your flesh sizzling as the DIGESTIVE JUICES continue to rise ... [ACTION] wait [STATE] You stop to rest for a moment. You can feel your flesh sizzling as the DIGESTIVE JUICES continue to rise ... [ACTION] wait [STATE] You stop to rest for a moment. You can feel your flesh sizzling as the DIGESTIVE JUICES continue to rise ... [ACTION] wait [STATE] You stop to rest for a moment. You can feel your flesh sizzling as the DIGESTIVE JUICES continue to rise ... This incense is strong stuff; it could choke a SMOG MONSTER ... The squishy flesh beneath you begins to heave and undulate! There is a mighty roar, and a sickly wet sound ... It's definitely the smoke from the VIRAXIAN INCENSE! This beast cannot bear the irritation in its unholy bowels! You suppose that you, too, are something of a bowel irritant. Suddenly, you are squeezed tight by the constricting walls, and you feel you may be crushed to death and dissolved at the same time ... but then you are free, flying damply through the air, for a wet landing back on land ... Over some bluffs to the immediate south, you can hear the sounds of the SLAVER KING'S harbor town. To the east are some pines. [ACTION] inventory [STATE] You bear the following (both on your person and stashed in your trusty THESKIAN DUFFEL BAG): a FLESH-TOTEM OF DARTH VIRAXIS, the EYEPATCH OF ODIN, a DELICATELY-OILED CLOTH, a SLAB OF SNOW-SERPENT MEAT, a TWO-HANDED SWORD (held at the ready), an EAR OF CORN, a SUIT OF CHAINMAIL ARMOR (being worn), a SUIT OF BURLAP ARMOR (currently un-used) and a FLASHLIGHT. [ACTION] wear eyepatch [STATE] You bear the following (both on your person and stashed in your trusty THESKIAN DUFFEL BAG): a FLESH-TOTEM OF DARTH VIRAXIS, the EYEPATCH OF ODIN, a DELICATELY-OILED CLOTH, a SLAB OF SNOW-SERPENT MEAT, a TWO-HANDED SWORD (held at the ready), an EAR OF CORN, a SUIT OF CHAINMAIL ARMOR (being worn), a SUIT OF BURLAP ARMOR (currently un-used) and a FLASHLIGHT. [ACTION] wear eyepatch [STATE] Bestead thy plight and becalm mine own misdoubt! I would fain hear plain ACTION COMMANDS, marry-ed unto reasonable nouns! Sooth! The HELP command may offer some remedy. [ACTION] use eyepatch [STATE] Bestead thy plight and becalm mine own misdoubt! I would fain hear plain ACTION COMMANDS, marry-ed unto reasonable nouns! Sooth! The HELP command may offer some remedy. [ACTION] use eyepatch [STATE] You have heard that the god ODIN gained wisdom for losing his eye, but it feels more to you like losing some of your balance and gaining a dangerous blind-side in combat! But you suppose it makes you look menacing. [ACTION] south [STATE] You have heard that the god ODIN gained wisdom for losing his eye, but it feels more to you like losing some of your balance and gaining a dangerous blind-side in combat! But you suppose it makes you look menacing. [ACTION] south [STATE] MARKETPLACE This busy MARKETPLACE is the heart of the town, nestled against the mighty GATES of the CASTLE. You are careful to keep a low profile here, directly beneath the looming facade of the SLAVER KING'S own citadel. A lone GUARD stands watch before the GATES, staring ahead dutifully and ignoring the throng of the MARKETPLACE. [ACTION] south [STATE] MARKETPLACE This busy MARKETPLACE is the heart of the town, nestled against the mighty GATES of the CASTLE. You are careful to keep a low profile here, directly beneath the looming facade of the SLAVER KING'S own citadel. A lone GUARD stands watch before the GATES, staring ahead dutifully and ignoring the throng of the MARKETPLACE. [ACTION] south [STATE] BUSTLING PORT You tread carefully, here. This is the city of the SLAVER KING, and he may have spies anywhere! Fortunately, the crowd here at the docks is a varied, noisy mass of people and creatures from all corners of Vanth. The MARKETPLACE further north surrounds the CASTLE entrance. The DARK ALLEYWAY immediately south might offer shelter if the guards come running. A GROUP OF PIRATES stands around the gangplank of a mighty PIRATE SHIP, deciding who may or may not go IN. One pirate hoists a small child - his son - to his shoulder, and points at you. "You see that man? Now that's a REAL pirate, not a scurvy old beggar like me. I want you to be just like 'im when you grows up, lad." [ACTION] in [STATE] BUSTLING PORT You tread carefully, here. This is the city of the SLAVER KING, and he may have spies anywhere! Fortunately, the crowd here at the docks is a varied, noisy mass of people and creatures from all corners of Vanth. The MARKETPLACE further north surrounds the CASTLE entrance. The DARK ALLEYWAY immediately south might offer shelter if the guards come running. A GROUP OF PIRATES stands around the gangplank of a mighty PIRATE SHIP, deciding who may or may not go IN. One pirate hoists a small child - his son - to his shoulder, and points at you. "You see that man? Now that's a REAL pirate, not a scurvy old beggar like me. I want you to be just like 'im when you grows up, lad." [ACTION] in [STATE] The jolly PIRATES wave merrily as you head up the gangplank, happy to see such a fine PIRATE as yourself among their company. Aboard the vessel there are few signs of life, only a single peg-legged DWARF, swabbing the deck with a combination CRUTCH and MOP. You note with curiosity that the DWARF also wears a heavy coat of CHAINMAIL, and something in his bearing suggests that he was once a Warrior, like you (of perhaps half your Level). The DWARF pauses from his chores for a moment to greet you. "Avast ye, me hearty! Me name's GUNWAR, what rhymes with HAR! Har." (press a key when ready) PIRATE SHIP The ship is mostly deserted at the moment; the PIRATES are OUT on the quayside. The deck here is admirably stained with the blood of many a cutlass-duel, and littered with the usual ROPES and MASTS and nautical miscellany. Most of the hatches are securely locked, but you find one open passage leading downwards. GUNWAR the peg-legged DWARF is here, swabbing the deck. [ACTION] parley with gunwar [STATE] The jolly PIRATES wave merrily as you head up the gangplank, happy to see such a fine PIRATE as yourself among their company. [ACTION] parley with gunwar [STATE] "I've never eaten a BEE GIRL QUEEN myself, but I hear they're 81% tasty." [ACTION] down [STATE] CABIN This must be the cabin of one of the officers; it is well-appointed and looks reasonably comfortable for such a cramped space. At least, it's far nicer than the rowing bench you recall from the SLAVER KING'S galleys ... You can see a GLITTERING THING here. [ACTION] examine thing [STATE] CABIN This must be the cabin of one of the officers; it is well-appointed and looks reasonably comfortable for such a cramped space. At least, it's far nicer than the rowing bench you recall from the SLAVER KING'S galleys ... You can see a GLITTERING THING here. [ACTION] examine thing [STATE] You lift the delicate GLITTERING THING from the CABIN'S small writing-desk, and turn it over in your hand. It flows and shimmers with great beauty! You see now that it is a woman's garter ... the jolly jack-tar inhabiting this cabin must have entertained some intimate company here! And the way the colors move, it can only be ANGELGLASS, that strange material you've seen in items from GOD CITY. A valuable treasure, you are sure, so into your THESKIAN DUFFEL BAG it (gingerly) goes. [ACTION] use angelglass [STATE] You lift the delicate GLITTERING THING from the CABIN'S small writing-desk, and turn it over in your hand. It flows and shimmers with great beauty! You see now that it is a woman's garter ... the jolly jack-tar inhabiting this cabin must have entertained some intimate company here! And the way the colors move, it can only be ANGELGLASS, that strange material you've seen in items from GOD CITY. A valuable treasure, you are sure, so into your THESKIAN DUFFEL BAG it (gingerly) goes. [ACTION] use angelglass [STATE] Out of a manly curiosity and nothing more, you decide to see if the garter would fit a masculine, manly barbarian like you, who is very much a man. Looking around to make sure no one is watching (because a sight so very manly might overwhelm them with sheer machismo), you slip it over your foot and up your leg ... Interestingly enough, the strange nature of ANGELGLASS is such that it fits you perfectly. You feel pretty. [ACTION] shed angelglass [STATE] Out of a manly curiosity and nothing more, you decide to see if the garter would fit a masculine, manly barbarian like you, who is very much a man. Looking around to make sure no one is watching (because a sight so very manly might overwhelm them with sheer machismo), you slip it over your foot and up your leg ... Interestingly enough, the strange nature of ANGELGLASS is such that it fits you perfectly. You feel pretty. [ACTION] shed angelglass [STATE] From any but a barbarian, I would presume such a command SORCERY most perplexing! Your game manual, or the HELP command, might give aid and succor. [ACTION] remove angelclass [STATE] From any but a barbarian, I would presume such a command SORCERY most perplexing! Your game manual, or the HELP command, might give aid and succor. [ACTION] remove angelclass [STATE] You speak madness, barbarian! Refer to your game manual for assistance. [ACTION] inventory [STATE] You speak madness, barbarian! [ACTION] up [STATE] PIRATE SHIP The ship is mostly deserted at the moment; the PIRATES are OUT on the quayside. The deck here is admirably stained with the blood of many a cutlass-duel, and littered with the usual ROPES and MASTS and nautical miscellany. Most of the hatches are securely locked, but you find one open passage leading downwards. GUNWAR the peg-legged DWARF is here, swabbing the deck. GUNWAR chuckles as he espies the GARTER on your thigh. "Ye'd make a right proper mariner, lad." [ACTION] out [STATE] PIRATE SHIP The ship is mostly deserted at the moment; the PIRATES are OUT on the quayside. This is the city of the SLAVER KING, and he may have spies anywhere! Fortunately, the crowd here at the docks is a varied, noisy mass of people and creatures from all corners of Vanth. The MARKETPLACE further north surrounds the CASTLE entrance. The DARK ALLEYWAY immediately south might offer shelter if the guards come running. A GROUP OF PIRATES stands around the gangplank of a mighty PIRATE SHIP, deciding who may or may not go IN. A young pirate espies the ANGELGLASS GARTER on your thigh and grins. "I been wonderin' when BOSUN BLACKSTEEL would find that special someone to give that treasure to." [ACTION] south [STATE] BUSTLING PORT You tread carefully, here. [ACTION] south [STATE] DARK ALLEYWAY Places like this wretched ALLEYWAY make you yearn for the clean air and freedom of the open country. Buildings lean against one another, far above your head, and RATS scurry around the base of a large BARREL. To the north lay the bustling quayside. To the south, you could easily scramble over the city wall and up a brambly hill. Light shines from a half-open doorway nearby, you could go IN if you wanted. The air from the doorway smells of subtle perfumes and spices. [ACTION] in [STATE] DARK ALLEYWAY Places like this wretched ALLEYWAY make you yearn for the clean air and freedom of the open country. Buildings lean against one another, far above your head, and RATS scurry around the base of a large BARREL. To the north lay the bustling quayside. To the south, you could easily scramble over the city wall and up a brambly hill. Light shines from a half-open doorway nearby, you could go IN if you wanted. The air from the doorway smells of subtle perfumes and spices. [ACTION] in [STATE] PERFUMED BOUDOIR You find yourself in a soft maze of colored veils, leading to a large bed piled with furs and cloth pillows. There are no candles or oil-lamps here, but rather globes of red glass lit by magic, pulsing with the rhythm of soft music. VESSA is here, sprawled across the bed and grinning at you, invitingly. VESSA grins as she espies the ANGELGLASS GARTER on your thigh. "Kinky!" [ACTION] east [STATE] PERFUMED BOUDOIR You find yourself in a soft maze of colored veils, leading to a large bed piled with furs and cloth pillows. There are no candles or oil-lamps here, but rather globes of red glass lit by magic, pulsing with the rhythm of soft music. VESSA is here, sprawled across the bed and grinning at you, invitingly. VESSA grins as she espies the ANGELGLASS GARTER on your thigh. "Kinky!" [ACTION] east [STATE] DARK ALLEYWAY Places like this wretched ALLEYWAY make you yearn for the clean air and freedom of the open country. Buildings lean against one another, far above your head, and RATS scurry around the base of a large BARREL. To the north lay the bustling quayside.
